mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLYBOARD VALUES ( SEQ_REPLYBOARD.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{password}, SYSDATE, #{reGroup}, #{reStep}, #{reLevel}, 0, #{contents} )
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(REGROUP),1) AS REGROUPMAX FROM REPLYBOARD
SELECT * FROM (SELECT B.*,ROWNUM AS NUM FROM ( SELECT * FROM REPLYBOARD ORDER BY REGROUP DESC, RELEVEL ASC ) B ) WHERE NUM >= #{start} AND NUM < #{end}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT B.*,ROWNUM AS NUM FROM ( SELECT * FROM REPLYBOARD WHERE ${field} LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' ORDER BY REGROUP DESC, RELEVEL ASC ) B ) WHERE NUM >= #{start} AND NUM < #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM REPLYBOARD
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLYBOARD SET READCOUNT = READCOUNT + 1 WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT B.*,ROWNUM AS NUM FROM ( SELECT * FROM REPLYBOARD ORDER BY REGROUP DESC, RELEVEL ASC ) B) WHERE NUM = #{num} - 1
SELECT * FROM (SELECT B.*,ROWNUM AS NUM FROM ( SELECT * FROM REPLYBOARD ORDER BY REGROUP DESC, RELEVEL ASC ) B) WHERE NUM = #{num} + 1
SELECT PASSWORD FROM REPLYBOARD WHERE NO = #{no}
